legs.desc: (Reps per leg x sets). With one leg raised and placed on the bench behind you and the other leg at a right angle in front of you, your arms at your sides, squat down until your arms nearly reach the floor. Hold weights in both hands to increase the weight.
Knees slightly bent, lean forward with dumbbells close to shins. You will feel the exercise in your hamstrings.

push.desc: With bench back at a 20째 incline, press barbell (optionally dumbbell) away from your body, focusing on squeezing your chest at the top of the press.
With bench back rest at a 90째 angle, sit straight up, starting with shoulders at right angles to the torso and press dumbbells straight up.

pull.desc: Arms begin the exercise perpendicular to the floor, with dumbbells pointed forward, curl arms up twisting forearms as you go to finish with hands facing you.
Lean forward, hands facing behind you, pull dumbbells up so they finish in line with the chest, focusing on pinching your shoulder blades together at the top of the exercise.

knees.desc: Standing on one leg, with your other leg pointed forward (12 O'Clock), squat with as far as you can go. Perform 3-5 squats, then repeat for your leg pointed at 1:30, 3, 4:30, 6 and finishing at 7:30.
Jump as high as you can go, then when you land, squat as low as you can. Perform five jumps for six sets, resting for a minute or so between each set
